detaileddescription.para:
Signal function of the Tab view
tabview
pointer to a Tab view object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Signal function of a tab's page
tab
pointer to a tab page object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Signal function of the tab page's scrollable object
tab_scrl
pointer to a tab page's scrollable object
sign
a signal type from lv_signal_t enum
param
pointer to a signal specific variable
LV_RES_OK: the object is not deleted in the function; LV_RES_INV: the object is deleted

Called when a tab's page or scrollable object is pressed
tabview
pointer to the btn view object
tabpage
pointer to the page of a btn

Called when a tab's page or scrollable object is being pressed
tabview
pointer to the btn view object
tabpage
pointer to the page of a btn

Called when a tab's page or scrollable object is released or the press id lost
tabview
pointer to the btn view object
tabpage
pointer to the page of a btn

Called when a tab button is clicked
tab_btnm
pointer to the tab's button matrix object
event
type of the event

Realign and resize the elements of Tab view
tabview
pointer to a Tab view object

Create a Tab view object
par
pointer to an object, it will be the parent of the new tab
copy
pointer to a tab object, if not NULL then the new object will be copied from it
pointer to the created tab

Delete all children of the scrl object, without deleting scrl child.
obj
pointer to an object

Add a new tab with the given name
tabview
pointer to Tab view object where to ass the new tab
name
the text on the tab button
pointer to the created page object (lv_page). You can create your content here

Set a new tab
tabview
pointer to Tab view object
id
index of a tab to load
anim
LV_ANIM_ON: set the value with an animation; LV_ANIM_OFF: change the value immediately

Enable horizontal sliding with touch pad
tabview
pointer to Tab view object
en
true: enable sliding; false: disable sliding

Set the animation time of tab view when a new tab is loaded
tabview
pointer to Tab view object
anim_time_ms
time of animation in milliseconds

Set the style of a tab view
tabview
pointer to a tan view object
type
which style should be set
style
pointer to the new style

Set the position of tab select buttons
tabview
pointer to a tan view object
btns_pos
which button position

Set whether tab buttons are hidden
tabview
pointer to a tab view object
en
whether tab buttons are hidden

Get the index of the currently active tab
tabview
pointer to Tab view object
the active btn index

Get the number of tabs
tabview
pointer to Tab view object
btn count

Get the page (content area) of a tab
tabview
pointer to Tab view object
id
index of the btn (>= 0)
pointer to page (lv_page) object

Get horizontal sliding is enabled or not
tabview
pointer to Tab view object
true: enable sliding; false: disable sliding

Get the animation time of tab view when a new tab is loaded
tabview
pointer to Tab view object
time of animation in milliseconds

Get a style of a tab view
tabview
pointer to a ab view object
type
which style should be get
style pointer to a style

Get position of tab select buttons
tabview
pointer to a ab view object

Get whether tab buttons are hidden
tabview
pointer to a tab view object
whether tab buttons are hidden
